name: Complicat
description:
Have you ever seen a cat that runs on two legs?

Why is the cat running? Why is he wearing a cloak? Why so many things awkward?

Welcome to the story where you play as a cat in the midst of the destruction of the world. A world full of pollution, carbon emissions, waste disposal………and Zombies.

Compli-Cat…… As the name implies, this game presents a very difficult mechanic to play because it combines Hack n Slash with a touch of Endless Run. The combination of these two things makes for a complex and interesting playing sensation for played. Welcome to Compli-Cat.
